case.title: Create account with required data

custom.preconds: User has an email address

step.content: User enters his email address
step.expected: User's e-mail address appears in the text field

step.content: User clicks the button "create an account"
step.expected: User is taken to a page to enter personal data

step.content: User fills in the fields with the required personal data (first name, last name, password, home address, postal address, country of residence, state, telephone number)
step.expected: The fields are filled in

step.content: User presses the "register" button
step.expected: User is transferred to the "my account" page

case.title: Create an account (with optional data)

custom.preconds: the user has an email address

step.content: User enters the e-mail address in the text field.
step.expected: User's e-mail address appears in the text field.

step.content: User presses create an account.
step.expected: User is transferred to the page for adding personal data.

step.content: User fills in the fields with personal information (optional and required).
step.expected: The fields are filled in.

step.content: User presses the register button.
step.expected: User is redirected to the "my account" page.

case.title: The user can log in

custom.preconds: User has an account on the website

step.content: User enters the e-mail address and password in the text fields.
step.expected: The text fields are filled in.

step.content: The user presses the "Sign in" button.
step.expected: The user is logged in and taken to the "my account" page.

case.title: The user can go to the login section

custom.preconds: User has access to the home page.

step.content:
The user presses the sign in button.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/8f6f21b3-9411-4d21-80ba-d69091780a39)
step.expected: User is taken to the "AUTHENTICATION" page.

case.title: User can log in with an incorrect password (negative)

custom.preconds: User has an account on the website.

step.content: User fills in the fields "email address" and "password" with an incorrect password.
step.expected: User is not logged in and is taken to the "my account" page.

case.title: The user can sign out

custom.preconds: The user is logged in.

step.content: The user presses the 'sign out' button.
step.expected: The user is logged out.

case.title: Contact us button (logged in, required fields only)

custom.preconds: User is logged in on the website.

step.content: User presses the 'contact us' button.
step.expected: User is redirected to the "CUSTOMER SERVICE - CONTACT US" page, with a pre-filled email address field.

step.content: The user fills in the required fields (Subject heading, message)
step.expected: The fields are filled in.

step.content: The user presses the 'send' button.
step.expected: The message is sent.

case.title: sending messages via the 'contact us' section without filling in the 'message' field while logged in (negative)

custom.preconds: User is logged in.

step.content: User fills in the required fields (Subject Heading), the email field is already filled in.
step.expected: the text fields are filled in.

step.content: The user presses the send button without filling in the 'message' field.
step.expected: Message is not sent.

case.title: Sending messages via the 'contact us' section (not logged in, required fields only)

custom.preconds: The user is in the 'contact us' section and is not logged in.

step.content: User fills in all fields (Subject Heading, Email address, Order reference, Attach File, Message).
step.expected: The fields are filled in.

step.content: User presses 'send' button.
step.expected: The message is sent.

case.title: Sending messages via the 'contact us' section (logged in, additional data)

custom.preconds: User is not logged in to the website. User is on the 'CUSTOMER SERVICE - CONTACT US' page.

step.content: The user fills in the required and optional fields (Subject Heading, Email address, Order reference, attach file, message).
step.expected: the fields are filled in.

step.content: User presses send button.
step.expected: The message is sent.

case.title: Sending messages via the 'contact us' section (not logged in, additional data)

custom.preconds: User is not logged into the site, the user is in the 'Contact us' section.

step.content: The user fills in the required and optional fields (Subject Heading, Email address, Order reference, attach file, message)
step.expected: the fields are filled in.

step.content: The user presses send button.
step.expected: the message is sent.

case.title: Using the quick view option on the home page

custom.preconds: The user is on the homepage.

step.content: The user moves the cursor over the image and presses the 'quick view' button.
step.expected: The user is taken to the product preview.

case.title: Adding a product to the cart from the 'quick view' preview

custom.preconds: The user is in the 'quick view' preview.

step.content: The user selects values: quantity (default 1), size (default s) and colour.
step.expected: values are selected.

step.content: The user presses the 'add to cart' button.
step.expected: The product is added to the shopping cart, you are redirected to the shopping cart summary page.

case.title: The user is able to share the product on social media from quick view (Twitter)

custom.preconds: The user is in the 'quick view' preview.

step.content: User presses "Tweet" button.
step.expected: A window appears with the option to publish a tweet.

case.title: The user is able to share the product on social media from quick view (Facebook)

custom.preconds: The user is in a "quick view" preview

step.content: User presses the "share" button (facebook)
step.expected: A window appears with the option to share the product on Facebook.

case.title: The user is able to share the product on social media from quick view (Google+)

custom.preconds: The user is in a "quick view" preview

step.content: The user presses the "Google +" button.
step.expected: A window appears with the option to share the product on Google+.

case.title: The user is able to share the product on social media from quick view (Pinterest)

custom.preconds: The user is in a "quick view" preview.

step.content: The user presses the "Pinterest" button
step.expected: A window appears with the option to share the product on Pinterest.

case.title: Adding a product to the wish list from the quick view preview

custom.preconds: The user is logged in, the user is in quick view.

step.content: The user presses the 'add to wishlist' button.
step.expected: The product is added to the wishlist, the message "product added to the wishlist" appears.

case.title: Proceeding to checkout from the shopping basket summary

custom.preconds: The user is logged in, the user has added the product to the cart, the user is at the cart summary level.

step.content: The user presses the 'proceed to checkout' button.
step.expected: The user is transferred to the 'SHOPPING-CART SUMMARY' section.

case.title: Adding products to cart

custom.preconds: User is logged in, user is in product preview.

step.content: The user presses the 'add to cart' button.
step.expected: The user is redirected to the basket summary, the item is added to the basket. The buttons "continue shopping", "Proceed to checkout" are displayed.

case.title: Proceed to checkout from the shopping cart (not logged)

custom.preconds: The user is not logged in, the user has added the product to the shopping cart, the user is in "SHOPPING-CART SUMMARY", in the 'summary' section.

step.content: The user presses the "proceed to checkout" button.
step.expected: The user is redirected to the 'sign in' section with a request to log in or create an account.

case.title: Proceed to checkout from the shopping cart (logged in, no optional data)

custom.preconds: The user is logged in, the user has added the product to the shopping cart, the user is in "SHOPPING-CART SUMMARY", in the 'summary' section.

step.content: The user presses the "proceed to checkout" button.
step.expected: The user is redirected to the "address" section.

step.content: The user presses the "proceed to checkout" button.
step.expected: The user is redirected to the "shipping" section.

step.content: The user selects a delivery option, indicates agreement to the terms of service (required) and presses the "proceed to checkout" button
step.expected: The user is redirected to the "payment" section.

step.content: The user selects a payment method and presses the "I confirm my order" button.
step.expected:
The order is placed. Information appears "Your order on My Store is complete.
Please send us a bank wire with - Amount $18.51 - Name of account owner Pradeep Macharla - Include these details xyz - Bank name RTP - Do not forget to insert your order reference FOKYGKUTY in the subject of your bank wire. An email has been sent with this information. Your order will be sent as soon as we receive payment. If you have questions, comments or concerns, please contact our expert customer support team. ."

case.title: Proceed to checkout from the shopping cart ( logged in user, optional informations)

custom.preconds: 1 The user is logged in, 2 the user has added the product to the shopping cart, 3 the user is in "SHOPPING-CART SUMMARY" 4 The user is in summary section

step.content: The user presses the "proceed to checkout" button
step.expected: The user is redirected to the "address" section.

step.content: The user fills in the comment field (optional) and presses the "proceed to checkout" button
step.expected: The user is redirected to the "shipping" section.

step.content: The user selects the delivery method and agrees to the terms of service (required) and presses the "proceed to checkout" button
step.expected: The user is redirected to the "payment" section.

step.content: The user selects a payment method and presses the "I confirm my order" button
step.expected:
The order is placed, information appears "Your order on My Store is complete.
Please send us a bank wire with - Amount $18.51 - Name of account owner Pradeep Macharla - Include these details xyz - Bank name RTP - Do not forget to insert your order reference FOKYGKUTY in the subject of your bank wire. An email has been sent with this information. Your order will be sent as soon as we receive payment. If you have questions, comments or concerns, please contact our expert customer support team. ."

case.title: Removing products from the shopping cart (logged in)

custom.preconds: 1 The user is logged in 2 User added the product to the basket 3 User is in the "Shopping cart summary" section

step.content: The user presses the button with the bin icon.
step.expected: The product is removed from the basket.

case.title: The user is able to share the product on social media from product details (Twitter)

custom.preconds: The user is in the "product details" section.

step.content: The user presses the 'Tweet' button.
step.expected: A window appears with the option to share the product on Twitter.

case.title: The user is able to share the product on social media from product details (Facebook)

custom.preconds: The user is in the "product details" section

step.content: User presses the "share" button (facebook)
step.expected: A window appears with the option to share the product on Facebook.

case.title: The user is able to share the product on social media from product details (Google+)

custom.preconds: The user is in the "product details" section

step.content: The user presses the "Google +" button
step.expected: A window appears with the option to share the product on Google+.

case.title: The user is able to share the product on social media from product details (Pinterest)

custom.preconds: The user is in the "product details" section

step.content: The user presses the "Pinterest" button
step.expected: A window appears with the option to share the product on Pinterest.

case.title: The user can give feedback in the section "product details" (only required)

custom.preconds: 1 The user is logged in 2 The user is in the "product details" section

step.content: The user clicks the "write a review" button.
step.expected: A window with an option to write a review appears.

step.content: The user fills in the required fields "Title", "Comment" and presses the send button.
step.expected: The comment is posted, a window appears with the information "Your comment has been added and will be available once approved by a moderator"

case.title: The user can give feedback in the section "product details" (optional data)

custom.preconds: 1 The user is logged in 2 The user is in the "product details" section

step.content: The user clicks the "write a review" button.
step.expected: A window with an option to write a review appears.

step.content: The user fills in the required fields (Title, Comment) and selects a rating from the 'quality' field (optional, set to 3 by default) and presses the 'send' button.
step.expected: The comment is posted, a window appears with the information "Your comment has been added and will be available once approved by a moderator"
